MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW7 postcode area of Winsford, affecting properties in Sandyhill Road, Swanlow Lane and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  7:54 AM.Our engineers have arrived at the local area to investigate the cause. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 11 AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:18 AM on 21st February 2021.
